languages.text: "Очевидно, это попытка нарушить ход трибунала. {name}, советую тебе следить за языком и быть послушн{mf|ым|ой}. Тогда, возможно — только возможно — ты сможешь сохранить свою жалкую жизнь". {n}Дознаватель посылает в вашу сторону испепеляющий взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Очевидно, это попытка нарушить ход трибунала жалкими потугами заговорить нам зубы нелепыми насмешками. {name}, советую тебе следить за языком и быть послушн{mf|ым|ой}. Тогда, возможно, только возможно, ты сможешь сохранить свою жалкую жизнь!" {n}Дознаватель злобно стискивает челюсти и посылает в вашу сторону взгляд, полный испепеляющей ненависти.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Очевидно, это попытка нарушить ход трибунала. {name}, советую тебе следить за языком и быть послушн{mf|ым|ой}. Тогда, возможно — только возможно — ты сможешь сохранить свою жалкую жизнь". {n}Дознаватель посылает в вашу сторону испепеляющий взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This is obviously an attempt to disrupt the trial with pathetic attempts at mockery. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and remain obedient. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life!" {n}The Interrogator clenches his jaw angrily and shoots you a look of abject hatred.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is obviously an attempt to disrupt the trial with pathetic attempts at mockery. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and remain obedient. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life!" {n}The Interrogator clenches his jaw angrily and shoots you a look of abject hatred.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is obviously an attempt to disrupt the trial with pathetic attempts at mockery. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and remain obedient. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life!" {n}The Interrogator clenches his jaw angrily and shoots you a look of abject hatred.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is obviously an attempt to disrupt the trial with pathetic attempts at mockery. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and remain obedient. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life!" {n}The Interrogator clenches his jaw angrily and shoots you a look of abject hatred.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « De toute évidence, {mf|il|elle} tente de perturber le déroulement du procès. Votre misérable vie ne tient qu'à un fil, {name},alors je vous suggère de tenir votre langue et de surveiller votre comportement. » {n}L'interrogateur vous jette un regard noir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, vous tentez de perturber le déroulement du procès par de pitoyables moqueries. Votre misérable vie ne tient qu'à un fil, {name}, alors je vous suggère de tenir votre langue et de rester docile. » {n}L'interrogateur serre les mâchoires de rage et vous jette un regard plein de haine.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “很显然，{mf|他|她}打算扰乱这场审判。{name}，我建议你说话当心点，保持顺从。或许，仅仅是或许，这可以保全你可悲的性命！”{n}海因里希瞪了你一眼，投来了充满怨毒的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “很显然，{mf|他|她}不过是打算靠着徒劳的嘲弄，扰乱这场审判。{name}，我建议你说话当心点，保持顺从的态度。或许，仅仅是或许，这可以保全你可悲的性命！”{n}海因里希愤怒地咬紧牙关，向你投来了充满怨毒的目光。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「これは明らかに裁判を妨害しようとする、哀れで無駄な試みである。 {name}、あなたは口を慎み、従順でいることを勧める。そうするだけで、己の惨めな人生を失わずに済むかもしれんのだぞ！」{n}インテロゲイターは歯を食いしばり、憎悪に満ちた視線をあなたに向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これは明らかに裁判を妨害しようとする、哀れで無駄な試みである。 {name}、あなたは口を慎み、従順でいることを勧める。そうするだけで、己の惨めな人生を失わずに済むかもしれんのだぞ！」{n}インテロゲイターは歯を食いしばり、憎悪に満ちた視線をあなたに向けた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Er|Sie} versucht ganz offenkundig, den Prozess zu stören. {name}, ich schlage vor, dass Ihr Eure Zunge hütet und Euch benehmt. Vielleicht, aber nur vielleicht, bleibt dann Euer jämmerliches Leben verschont." {n}Der Interrogator wirft dir einen vernichtenden Blick zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist offensichtlich ein Versuch, den Prozess mit erbärmlichem Spott der Lächerlichkeit preiszugeben. {name}, ich schlage vor, dass Ihr Eure Zunge hütet und Gehorsam bewahrt. Und vielleicht, aber nur vielleicht, bleibt dann Euer jämmerliches Leben verschont." {n}Der Interrogator presst wutentbrannt seinen Kiefer zusammen und blickt dich hasserfüllt an.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Está claro que intenta sabotear el juicio. {name}, le recomiendo que modere su lenguaje y se comporte debidamente. Así, es posible que baste para salvar su miserable vida». {n}El interrogador te lanza una mirada asesina.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Obviamente se trata de un intento por boicotear el juicio con mofas patéticas. {name}, sugiero que contenga su lengua y se muestre obediente. ¡Quizá entonces, y solo quizás, logre salir de aquí con su miserable vida!». {n}El interrogador aprieta la mandíbula enfurecido y te lanza una mirada de odio abyecto.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Açık şekilde mahkemeye engel olmaya çalışıyor. {name}, diline hâkim olmanı ve aşırıya kaçan hareketlerde bulunmamanı tavsiye ederim. Belki, ki bu büyük bir belki... O zaman o sefil canından olmayabilirsin." {n}Sorgucu sana kuru bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|He|She} is obviously trying to disrupt the trial. {name}, I suggest you watch your tongue and behave yourself. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your miserable life." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a withering glare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Açık şekilde mahkemeye engel olmaya çalışıyor. {name}, diline hâkim olmanı ve aşırıya kaçan hareketlerde bulunmamanı tavsiye ederim. Belki, ki bu büyük bir belki, belki o zaman o sefil yaşamından olmayabilirsin." {n}Sorgucu sana kuru bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
